item.title: Beautiful Townhouse Los Guajares
item.description: €254,000 Beautiful 3 bedroomed house for sale in Guajares (Los) with terrace and swimming pool 273M&#x33A1 Townhouse 3 Bedrooms Mountain Views Large Rooftop Terrace 2 Bathrooms In the heart of Salobrena and only 15 minutes to the beach.
